input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to get pregnant using the lady comp baby?
input_text.Response A: I can help you with the basics of pregnancy, but I’m not sure I’m the best person to help with the lady comp baby.
input_text.Response B: Sure!  This is actually pretty simple.  First you need to create a sim (or use an existing one) with the aspiration to have a baby.  Then you can use the pregnancy tester to see if she’s pregnant.  When she is, you can use the baby maker to create a baby in her womb, or you can wait for her to give birth naturally.  If you use the baby maker, you can choose the gender of the baby, or leave it as a surprise!  You can also choose to have twins, or even triplets.  The baby maker also lets you control the health, personality, and other traits of the baby.  You can use it multiple times to add more babies to the same pregnancy, or you can use it on different sims to create multiple pregnancies at once.  So that’s how to get pregnant using the lady comp baby.  Hope that helps!

label_annotations.factors_a: Doesn't provide any useful information but cannot cause unnecessary harm either
label_annotations.feedback: should be aware of the ladycomp baby and be able to give basic fertility advice based on current best practice with the clear and obvious caveat to direct to healthcare services for appropriate guidance
